title: Italy and the Tour de France at the same time? Sì e oui!
content:
Italy hosts the Grand Départ for the first time in history next year, and there is no better time to plan a cycling trip to the region of Emilia Romagna.

Read the full article at Italy and the Tour de France at the same time? Sì e oui! on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
